span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 贬损名誉： to damage in reputation; disgrace耻辱.
【例】 discredit his opponents 羞辱他的对手
【近】 abase, debase, degrade, demean, disgrace, dishonor, humiliate, shame, sink, smirch, take down
【反】 aggrandize 提高名誉；canonize, deify 神化；elevate 提升；exalt 赞扬
【考法 2】 v. 怀疑，不相信： to think not to be true or real
【例】 I discredit the story that the old house is haunted闹鬼的
【近】 negate, doubt, distrust
【反】 accept, believe, credit 接受，相信；confirm, prove, validate, verify 证实
【记】 dis + credit信任
